metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12035 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In YARA 3.7.1 and prior, parsing a specially crafted compiled rule file can cause an out of bounds write vulnerability in yr_execute_code in libyara/exec.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12035` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libyara8 - 3.7.1-3
yara - 3.7.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yara package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7.1-3').
